attributes.action: Stop the selling of Camelot to a foreign buyer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Yet again this Government are allowing the sale of a British National Asset to a foreign buyer for peanuts. This practice has got to stop and we the UK taxpayer's insist that the Government revoke Camelots lottery licence, should this sale go ahead.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
